alert.note: Alert for Western Greene; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 03 at 3:41PM EST until February 04 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total sleet and snow accumulations of a trace to 3 inches and ice accumulations of one tenth up to one half inch. * WHERE...Western Greene and Western Ulster Counties in the eastern Catskills. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Travel could be treacherous. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Sleet and freezing rain will develop this evening. The sleet and freezing rain will change to snow on Friday. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
